tokens.text: has connection rules for adjacent blocks

generated_doNotEdit.title: Connection Rule
generated_doNotEdit.description:
Defines whether other blocks such as fences, walls, bars, and glass panes are allowed to connect to this block.
Experimental toggles required: Upcoming Creator Features (in format versions before 1.26.0)

fields.title: Accepts Connections From
fields.description: The type of block allowed to connect to this block. Currently, the options are: `all` (default), `only_fences`, and `none`. Note that the `only_fences` option allows connections from all Vanilla fences excluding NetherBrick.

fields.title: Enabled Directions
fields.description: The cardinal directions that connection is enabled for: `north`, `south`, `east`, and `west`. All directions are enabled by default. Note that if `none` is specified for `accepts_connections_from`, this field will not be used.
